caption: Relating to the determination of resident status of students by public institutions of higher education.
undersanding:
Summary (under 80 words):
This bill modifies Texas Education Code regarding resident status determination for higher education. It removes provisions that allowed undocumented students who graduated from Texas high schools to qualify for in-state tuition. The bill explicitly states that individuals not authorized under federal law to be in the US cannot be considered Texas residents for tuition purposes. This affects all non-authorized immigrants, including Chinese students without proper documentation.

Chinese Translation:
该法案修改德克萨斯州教育法典中关于高等教育居民身份认定的规定。法案删除了允许在德州高中毕业的无证学生享受州内学费的条款。法案明确规定，根据联邦法律未获准在美国居留的个人不能被视为德州居民。这将影响所有无合法身份的移民，包括没有适当文件的中国学生。
